description: Perfect for a light lunch, this slow-cooked 3-step cheese and bacon loaf recipe is surprisingly easy. Once cooked, the loaf is best served warm with relish.
name: Slow Cooker Cheese & Bacon Loaf Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a medium non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add bacon and cook for 5 minutes, stirring, or until golden and crisp. Set aside.
Place flour and yoghurt in a large bowl. Using a flat-bladed knife, stir until a sticky dough forms. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until just smooth (avoid over-kneading).

HowToTip.tipText: To line the slow cooker with baking paper, scrunch up the paper, then flatten it out before placing it in slow-cooker bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease and line a 5.5L slow cooker with baking paper (see Tip). Flatten dough evenly over base of bowl. Scatter over cheese, herbs, bacon (including any oil) and rosemary. Cover with lid and cook on high for 2 hours or until dough is cooked through and cheese has melted. Serve warm with relish.
